name: PowerBook X15
description: A high-end laptop offering excellent performance with a powerful Intel Core i9-12900H processor, NVIDIA RTX 3070 GPU, and a large 32GB DDR5 RAM. Ideal for gaming, content creation, and heavy multitasking.

name: SuperPhone Z10
description: A flagship smartphone powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, boasting a sharp OLED display, 33W fast charging, and a 4500mAh battery for long-lasting performance.

name: AeroBook A12
description: A slim and portable laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 5800U processor, 16GB RAM, and AMD Radeon Vega 8 GPU, ideal for productivity and casual entertainment.

name: SlatePad X7
description: A budget-friendly tablet with a 10.4-inch IPS display, powered by MediaTek Helio G95 and 4GB of RAM, suitable for everyday tasks and media consumption.

name: iPhone Pro 14
description: Apple's latest flagship with the A16 Bionic chip, a stunning OLED display, and impressive battery life, making it perfect for high-end performance and photography.

name: Falcon GTX 9000
description: A powerful gaming desktop featuring Intel Core i7-12700K, NVIDIA RTX 3080, and 32GB RAM, optimized for gaming and 4K media.

name: SmartFit X8
description: A fitness-focused smartwatch with a 1.4-inch AMOLED display, 2GB RAM, and 2-day battery life, designed for tracking health and fitness activities.

name: SoundCore Elite 2
description: Wireless earbuds with long-lasting battery life (15 hours with the case) and a custom audio chip for superior sound quality.

name: Xtreme Pro 500
description: A high-performance desktop featuring an Intel Core i9-7900X, NVIDIA RTX 4090, and 64GB RAM, supporting 4K and VR gaming.

name: ZenBook V15
description: A sleek laptop with Intel Core i5-1155G7 processor, 8GB RAM, and a 15.6-inch Full HD display, offering a balance between performance and portability.

name: Pixel 7 Pro
description: Google's flagship smartphone with a Google Tensor G2 chip, a 6.7-inch OLED display, and a 5000mAh battery, known for its excellent photography capabilities.

name: Galaxy Tab S8
description: A versatile tablet with an 11-inch display, powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, offering a high-end performance for work and entertainment.

name: Beats Fit Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with Apple H1 chip, delivering great sound quality, and 6 hours of battery life for all-day use.

name: InspireBook X15
description: A powerful, mid-range laptop with Intel Core i5-12400H, 16GB RAM, and a 15.6-inch Full HD display, offering solid performance for most tasks.

name: PowerTower 9000
description: A powerhouse desktop featuring Intel Core i9-13900K, 128GB RAM, and an NVIDIA RTX 3090, ideal for content creators and gaming at the highest levels.

name: FitPro Smartwatch
description: A budget-friendly smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, Nordic Semiconductor chip, and 5 days of battery life, perfect for fitness tracking and notifications.

name: OnePlus 11 Pro
description: A premium smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, and a 5000mAh battery, offering high performance and fast charging capabilities.

name: iPad Pro 12.9
description: A high-end tablet powered by Apple M2 Chip, featuring a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina display and 128GB storage, offering a smooth experience for creative tasks.

name: Vivo V23
description: A mid-range smartphone with MediaTek Dimensity 1200U processor, 8GB RAM, and a 6.44-inch AMOLED display, offering a solid performance and camera capabilities.

name: EcoWatch 2.0
description: An affordable smartwatch with a 1.5-inch LCD display, Mediatek Airoha CPU, and up to 7 days of battery life, ideal for basic fitness tracking.

name: VelocityBook Z13
description: A compact and affordable laptop with Intel Core i3-1125G4, 8GB RAM, and a 13-inch Full HD display, offering essential computing power for daily use.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: A flagship smartphone with Snapdragon 888, a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, and 33W fast charging, providing a smooth experience for gaming and photography.

name: PowerBox 360
description: A gaming console featuring a custom AMD Ryzen CPU and RDNA 2 GPU, offering 4K gaming support and a 1TB SSD for fast load times.

name: DynoBook X10
description: A mid-range laptop featuring Intel Core i5-1165G7, 16GB RAM, and a 14-inch Full HD display, providing great performance for work and light gaming.

name: VeloWatch Elite
description: A stylish smartwatch with a 1.4-inch AMOLED display, offering 3 days of battery life, and 16GB storage for your data.

name: SpeedBook S12
description: A budget laptop with AMD Ryzen 5 5600U, 8GB RAM, and a 13-inch Full HD display, providing basic computing power for everyday use.
